segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let’s talk about your dependents, if you have any. Can you tell me, like, what’s the name of your dependent?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, I have a son, his name is, uh, Mark. But his full name is Mark James.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, Mark James. And, uh, when was he, like, born?
segments.client_message: He was born on, um, 10-05-2015. So, yeah, he’s, like, 8 now.
